dcterms:creator: P. Sen
G. Namata
M. Bilgic
L. Getoor
B. Galligher
T. Eliassi-Rad
dcterms:description: A citation network dataset where nodes correspond to documents and edges correspond to citation links. Each node has a sparse bag-of-words feature vector and a class label.
dcterms:title: Cora

dcterms:creator: P. Sen
G. Namata
M. Bilgic
L. Getoor
B. Galligher
T. Eliassi-Rad
dcterms:description: A citation network dataset similar to Cora, where nodes are documents and edges are citation links. Each document has a bag-of-words feature vector and a class label.
dcterms:title: Citeseer

dcterms:creator: P. Sen
G. Namata
M. Bilgic
L. Getoor
B. Galligher
T. Eliassi-Rad
dcterms:description: A large citation network dataset where nodes represent documents and edges represent citation links. Each document has a bag-of-words feature vector and a class label.
dcterms:title: Pubmed

dcterms:creator: O. Shchur
M. Mumme
A. Bojchevski
S. G"unnemann
dcterms:description: A co-authorship network dataset where nodes represent authors and edges indicate co-authorship. Node features represent paper keywords and class labels indicate the most active fields of study.
dcterms:title: Coauthor-CS

dcterms:creator: O. Shchur
M. Mumme
A. Bojchevski
S. G"unnemann
dcterms:description: A co-authorship network dataset similar to Coauthor-CS, where nodes represent authors and edges indicate co-authorship. Node features represent paper keywords and class labels indicate the most active fields of study.
dcterms:title: Coauthor-Phy
